text: mīṭa perada minisunṭa ṛju mārgōpadēśayan vaśayen tibunu, (pav, pin) venkara dænum diya hæki (anit) dæyada pahaḷa kara ættēya. ebævin kavurun allāhgē (ema) āyāvan pratikṣēpa karannōda, ovunṭa niyata vaśayenma daruṇu dan̆ḍuvam æta. allāh (siyallanṭama vaḍā) balasampannayeku hā (napuru ayagen) paḷi ganneku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
